name: electrodb
description: A library to more easily create and interact with multiple entities and heretical relationships in dynamodb

scripts.test:run: npm run test:types && npm run test:init && npm run test:unit
scripts.coverage: npm run test:init:hard && nyc npm run test:unit && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.coverage:local:coveralls: npm run test:init:hard && nyc npm run test:unit && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.coverage:local:html: npm run test:init:hard && nyc npm run test:unit && nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.ddb:load: docker compose exec electro npm run test:init:hard
scripts.examples:load:library: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init && ts-node ./examples/library/load.ts
scripts.examples:query:library: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init && ts-node ./examples/library/query.ts
scripts.examples:load:taskmanager: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init && ts-node ./examples/taskManager/load.ts
scripts.examples:query:taskmanager: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init && ts-node ./examples/taskManager/query.ts
scripts.examples:load:versioncontrol: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init && ts-node ./examples/versionControl/load.ts
scripts.examples:query:versioncontrol: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init && ts-node ./examples/versionControl/query.ts
scripts.examples:provisiontable: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init && ts-node ./examples/provisionTable
scripts.examples:locks: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init && ts-node ./examples/locks
scripts.local:start: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init
scripts.local:fresh: npm run ddb:start && npm run local:init:hard
scripts.local:debug: npm run local:start && npm run local:exec

author: Tyler W. Walch
